ygData.subject: RE: Re: revenge is sweet you know...
ygData.msgSnippet: i agree with everything you say.  the only problem is that EVERY person who had russet from PoF knew damn well it was going to be warrior only in a future
ygData.messageBody:
i agree with everything you say. the only problem is that EVERY person who
had russet from PoF knew damn well it was going to be warrior only in a
future patch. so they can take their whining and tell someone who cares
(unfortunately verant did care bleh). when we were in Fear, every piece of
russett after maybe the first day was allowed to be looted ONLY by warriors.
the only instance i saw was one bard with a breastplate and a different bard
with arms. and both of them knew full well they'd lose it. oh well, guess
i will feedback it hehe.

Shada

> Russet Armor: Same scenario as the Ranger who could not
> re-equip his Hero
> Bracer, but in this case, you remove your armor and now you
> have no armor,
> and you can't sell or trade it because it is NO TRADE NO
> DROP. I do think,
> however, that if you are high enough level to have that kind
> of item, you
> shouldn't have all that much trouble replacing it with
> something decent,
> (not from fear plane of course ;-) again (as in the box) fair
> warning would
> have resolved this.
>
> my 2cp
>
> -Faras
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
> > [mailto:Michael.Garramone@...]
> > Sent: Thursday, September 16, 1999 10:20 AM
> > To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> > Subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: revenge is sweet you know...
> >
> >
> > From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)"
> <Michael.Garramone@...>
> >
> > absolutely. i don't understand the reversal of lustrous
> russett from
> > warrior only to all plate wearers. it is obviously intended
> > to be warrior
> > only and i hope they change it back. every armor from PoF is
> > class specific
> > to one class. lustrous russett should be no different.
> >
> > Shada D'ukal, Level 50 Wood Elf Bard
> > Erisi Dlarit, Level 23 High Elf Paladin
> > Tyria, Level 17 High Elf Wizard
> > Mithaniel Marr Server
> >
> > > What does everyone think about all the changes from monday's
> > > patch that were
> > > reversed yesterday? (Box of abu ja'far [sorry, cannot resist
> > > : )], Hero Bracer
> > > etc.) Personally, i think the Lustrous Russet armor SHOULD
> > > BE warrior only,
> > > but they should have made it so instantly when they
> > > discovered the error.
> >
>
